content.en: Algorithmic Predictions: Researchers have explored the use of various algorithms, such as Support Vector Machines (SVM), Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO), and Genetic Algorithms (GA), to address different research questions related to gas compressibility factor, coal seam gas content, natural gas density, natural gas hydrate formation conditions, chemical exergy prediction, temperature drop in natural gas production systems, natural gas consumption demand, gross calorific value of coal, hydrate formation conditions, sulfur solubility in gas, gas outburst intensity, methane adsorption in shale, and gas outburst prediction. These algorithms are being used to develop intelligent models that can provide accurate predictions and insights in these areas.
content.da: Algoritmiske forudsigelser: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af forskellige algoritmer, såsom Support Vector Machines (SVM), Particle Swarm Optimization (PSO) og genetiske algoritmer (GA), for at besvare forskellige forskningsspørgsmål relateret til gaskompressibilitetsfaktor, gasindhold i kulflader, naturgasdensitet, naturgashydratdannelsesforhold, kemisk exergiforudsigelse, temperaturfald i naturgasproduktionssystemer, naturgasforbrugsbehov, brugsvarmeværdi for kul, hydratdannelsesforhold, svovlopløselighed i gas, gasudbrudsstyrke, metanadsorption i skifer og gasudbrudsforudsigelse. Disse algoritmer bruges til at udvikle intelligente modeller, der kan give præcise forudsigelser og indsigt på disse områder.
